r.d: This extension provides an IBM database driver for PDO. This driver supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, Apache Derby databases and IDS (Informix Data Server).
r.n: * 2020-12-01: 1.4.0 - Compatibility with PHP 8 - Merge Tony Cairns' fork with IBM i compatibility fixes - Fix compatibility with 64-bit PASE/modern IBM i (sqlcli-dev package, pointer/integer width mismatch, XMLSERVICE location, etc) - Major improvements to test suite (fix broken tests, less hardcoding) - Handle CCSID 65535 on IBM i - Fix warnings
